text: Bears live across North America, South America, Europe, and Asia. Different species occupy habitats ranging from Arctic sea ice (polar bears) to dense forests (brown and black bears) and high mountains (spectacled bears).

metadata.breadcrumb: Tigers and Bears > Bears > Where They Are Found

text: Bears are generally omnivores, with diets varying by species and season. They may eat plants, berries, fish, insects, small mammals, or carrion. Polar bears rely almost entirely on seals.
